inclusion.criterion: Underwent Autologous SCT 60-120 days prior to registration
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Minimum of 2 x 10^6 CD34+ cells/kg infused
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Full hematologic recovery following Auto HCT
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Available matched related or unrelated donor
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Women of child-bearing potential and sexually active males must use an accepted and effective method of birth control
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Bone marrow comprising of < 10% lymphoma on most recent biopsy/aspiration
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Serum bilirubin < or = 2 x the institutional ULN
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Serum creatinine < or = 2 x the institutional ULN and measured or estimated creatinine clearance > 60 cc/min
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Prior autologous or allogeneic hematopoietic cell transplantation (other than autologous SCT 60-120 days prior to registration)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Known or suspected progressive disease following autologous SCT
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has multiple myeloma with recurrent disease and systemic amyloidosis, on hemodialysis for ESRD. She was treated with various regimens including melphalan, prednisone, VAD, thalidomide, and velcade.
